divs: Sighting Detailsi was riding my bike one day on my street by myself when i looked up and noticed a silver circular dot traveling in a straight line about 30-40 thousand feet up i havent reported it until now because no one belives me i wasnt quite sure what to make of it back then but im postive of what i saw now that i look back at it.
trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around June 24th 2000
Summary: silver and high in the air
